// HS-KC section added for all speeds to prevent sensor inverting during external trigger keep clean
// Updated Vs-allH to remove flat baseline in crop mode MGB 29-04-14
// Last	modified 16July12	by DG
// P99 was based on	iXon Ultra Release 2:	 P87B25_1C.txt with	following	changes	to suit	201	sensor
// --	R1-R2-R3 change	from low-high-high to	high-high-low.
// --	setup	verticals	+	verniers to	make as	per	datasheet=


2	phase	device with	I1=I2, I3=I4,	S1=S2, S3=S4
For	iXon 201BI 24/18/12	MHz	with dual	channels of	ADC	16 bit LTC2207 @ 100 MHz,
for	both EM	and	conventional outputs.
Important	for	horz clks	to have	90%	overlap, if	not	done in	pattern	then in	verniers.

IMO	implant	is under Image 2?.
Sequence is	I1,	I2,	I3 down	towards	the	shift	reg.
Image	3	is last	row	before shift reg.
Charge is	transfered into	R1 and R2	with R3	aligned	with channel stops.
Sequence is: Node, OG, R3, R2, R1, R3...
S1 to	S4	Storage	area clks
I1 to	I4	Image	area clks
B		Engine branch	bit
SB1	to SP4	Engine loop	speed	bits (1+2exp(n-1))
EOL		End	Of Line	Flag (used to	gate ext trig	for	ODB	ctrl in	885	sensors)
RST		CCD	reset
SCP		Scope	mode output	(for diagnostics)
RHC		Run	Horizonal	Clock	from parallel	engine
RVC		Run	Vertical Clock from	parallel engine
HVF		EMCCD	HV falling edge
AR1/2		Input	amp	restore, channel 1 and 2
SYN		Synch	the	Continouous	R2HV (from parallel	engine)
DMP		Horz reg Dump	gate
HVR		EMCCD	HV rising	edge
R1 to	R3	Horz register	clks
CG2/3		Clamp-to-ground	2	and	3	(there is	no 1 anymore!)
MUX		Mux	between	analog channels
ARM		ARM	engine output
HSF		Horizontal Shift Section Flag
FIR		FIRE engine	output
SHT		Shutter	engine output
SST		Substrate	toggle
EMK		EM gain	kill
PA1/2		Pre	amp	gains	overide	of main	software
FRA		FRAME	engine output
RS		Reset	sample (D-CDS)
SS		Signal sample	(D-CDS)
ODK		OD kill	(stop	CCD	output amp glow)
CG2		TAG	-	4th	pin	on CN5
PXL		Valid	output pixel clk
SW		Summing	well clk
****************************************************************************************

Digitization=16

00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210

SIIBSSSS	SSIEISRS	RRH-AADS	HC-RRHAM	-EF-SPSF	RSROTPPS
441 PPPP	123O23SC	HVV RRMY	VG 31SRU	 MI SAHR	SS2DAAXW
    3210	      TP	CCF 12PC	R3   FMX	 KR T1TA	   KG2L
These two are used for row transfers for readout (VS-all is for	Fast Kinetics mode).
<VS-st>
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10010000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-st>

<VS-all>
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11010000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-all>

(These two were	to keep	horz clks	running	during FT	or skipping	over multiple	rows to	a	subarea
from DU888 pattern file... it	helped with	baseline.)
**RUN	bit	used to	turn on	Continuous Horizontals (R1,R2,R3,RST)from	FPGA
	at a software	programmable readout speed
<VS-stH>
00000000	11000010	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10010000	00000110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-stH>

<VS-allH>
00100000	11001010	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11010000	00100110	10000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-allH>

00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210

SIIBSSSS	SSI-ISRS	--H-AAD-	HC-RRHAM	-EF-SPSF	RSROCPPS
441 PPPP	123 23SC	  V RRM 	VG 31SRU	 MI SAHR	SS2DGAXW
    3210	      TP	  F 12P 	R3   FMX	 KR T1TA	   K22L

<VS-im>
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01100000	00101010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01100000	00101010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01010000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-im>

<VS-imH>
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	00001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01100000	00101010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01100000	00101010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01000000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
01010000	00100010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-imH>

SIIBSSSS	SSIEISRS	RRH-AADS	HC-RRHAM	-EF-SPSF	RSROTPPS
441 PPPP	123O23SC	HVV RRMY	VG 31SRU	 MI SAHR	SS2DAAXW
    3210	      TP	CCF 12PC	R3   FMX	 KR T1TA	   KG2L
Used to	generate 100ns + 20us	according	to 201 datasheet
<PDT>
00000100	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00101010	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00101010	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00101010	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00101010	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00101001	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00110111	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\PDT>

(from	97 pattern:Keep	RST on long enough to supress transients from	S clks.
 Allow 330ns for transients to decay, then RST off, then AmpRst for at least 100ns?
**SYNC bit used	to sychronized the Continuous R2HV.
This ensures that even with variable vert shift	speed
the R2HV remains in sync with R1,R2,R3,RST**

SIIBSSSS	SSIEISRS	RRH-AADS	HC-RRHAM	-EF-SPSF	RSROTPPS
441 PPPP	123O23SC	HVV RRMY	VG 31SRU	 MI SAHR	SS2DAAXW
    3210	      TP	CCF 12PC	R3   FMX	 KR T1TA	   KG2L
<VH>
00000101	00000010	00000001	00001000	00000000	00101000
00000011	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VH>

<HV>
00000010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\HV>

<HS1C30>
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000000	00000000	00000000	10001000	00000000	00000000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00010000	00000000	10100000
00010000	00000000	00100000	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\HS1C30>

<HS-KC1C30>
00100000	11001000	00000000	00001100	00000000	00000000

00100000	11001010	00000000	00010100	00000000	10100000
00110000	11001000	00100000	00010100	00000000	00000000
<\HS-KC1C30>

00000000	00000010	00001100	00010000	00000000	10100000
00010000	00000000	00101100	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\HS-EXP1C30>

00000010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000101	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000011	00000000	00001100	10001000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	10100000

<HS-KC1C1>
00100010	11001000	00000000	00001100	00000000	00000000
00100101	11001000	00000000	00001100	00000000	00000000
00100110	11001000	00000000	00001100	00000000	00000000
00100011	11001000	00001100	10001100	00000000	00000000
00100001	11001000	00000000	00001100	00000000	00100000
00100010	11001000	00000000	00000100	00000000	00100000
00100011	11001010	00000000	00000100	00000000	00100000
00100001	11001000	00000000	00010100	00000000	10100000

00100100	11001000	00000000	00010100	00000000	00000000

<EXP-NOHS1C1>
00000010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000101	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000000	00001100	10001000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	10100000
00000011	00000000	00101100	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000100	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\EXP-NOHS1C1>


500ns	long to	allow	time for AmpRst	and	leave	a	round	number for exposure	calculations.
(Removed for now because its lower speed allows	SR to	cool during	long exposures)
<HS-EXP1C1>
00000010	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000101	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000110	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000011	00000000	00001100	10001000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	10100000
00000011	00000000	00100000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000110	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000100	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00010010	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\HS-EXP1C1>

00000010	00000001	00000000	00001000	00000000	01000000
00000101	00000001	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000110	00000001	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000011	00000001	00001100	10001000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000001	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000010	00000001	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000011	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000001	00000000	00010000	00000000	10100000
00000011	00000001	00100000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000110	00000001	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000

<\EXP-NOHS1C1-HR>

500ns	long to	allow	time for AmpRst	and	leave	a	round	number for exposure	calculations.
(Removed for now because its lower speed allows	SR to	cool during	long exposures)
